definition: to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Do you knw where the conductor is?
sentences.chinese: 你知道列車長在哪裏嗎？

sentences.english: Just have to go and have a word with the conductor.
sentences.chinese: 我需要去和列車長講句話。

sentences.english: So the conductor woman hurried to take her into the sickroom which was blocked off by the bedsheets .
sentences.chinese: 女列車長趕緊將她帶進用牀單隔開的病房。

sentences.english: Why did the chief conductor go off duty without approval?
sentences.chinese: 列車長怎麼不經批准就擅自休班了？

sentences.english: You're welcome. Why don't you ask the conductor when he comes by?
sentences.chinese: 別客氣。待會兒列車長過來時，你何不問問他呢？

sentences.english: The guard said something from the moving train but I couldn't hear hime.
sentences.chinese: 列車長在行動中的火車上說了些什麼，但是我聽不到。

sentences.english: A guard stood at the open door of one of the cars.
sentences.chinese: 一個列車長站在其中一節車廂的門口。

sentences.english: Where can I find the train chlef?
sentences.chinese: 我能在哪兒找到列車長？

sentences.english: Or a conductor on a diesel train?
sentences.chinese: 一名柴油列車列車長又該如何是好？

sentences.english: Urine with plastic bags hidden in the conductor interior.
sentences.chinese: 小便用的塑料袋藏在列車長室內。

sentences.english: There is no formal apology from the conductor.
sentences.chinese: 沒有列車長的鄭重道歉。

definition: to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to
plumbing and electrical work/tradesman who does both plumbing and electrical work
out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to return something to its rightful owner
cat burglar/burglar who gains entrance by scaling walls/intruding enemy airman/air marauder
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
